meanings.definition: Resembling a slug or snail in movement or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The limacine trail left by the snail was easy to spot on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The limacine creature in the garden moved slowly and gracefully, just like a snail.
meanings.sent3: The limacine way the toddler crawled across the floor was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her limacine pace through the obstacle course earned her the nickname 'Snail Queen'.
meanings.sent5: The limacine motion of the dancer's arms added a unique elegance to her performance.

meanings.definition: Moving or progressing slowly and sluggishly.
meanings.sent1: The limacine traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The limacine river flowed gently through the valley, taking its time.
meanings.sent3: The limacine sloth finally reached the top of the tree after a long climb.
meanings.sent4: His limacine thoughts drifted lazily through his mind, taking their own sweet time.
meanings.sent5: The limacine clouds drifted across the sky, casting shadows on the fields below.
